The sharpest way to play against the Narjdorf as White.
 Also possible are
  A. 6.Bc4 Bobby Fisher's move of his choice and I recommend it!
  B. 6. Be3  I dont  recommend because a future Ng4 will disrupt development.
  C. 6. Be2 I don't recommend because it is passive
  D. 6.  f3  Is atleast ok. follow up with 7.Be3 but it looks rather slow.

Also playable is Bobby Fisher's favorite weapon 6. Qb6 which he got impressive 
  results with.
Threatning 8. e5!
Breaks the pin and allows the King to castle King side when ever he wants to.

Preventing 8. b5 because of 9.e5! threatening the Knight and the Rook on a8,
 also allows White to castle Queen-side and supports a future f5.
Threatening the Bishop.

White is correct not to exchange by 9. Bxf6 Bxf6 then Black is threatening the 
 Knight and also has the advantage of the 2 bishops.
